verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Anga na Mbingu vitangaze haya,
Dunia yote ishangilie jambo hili.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tazama Kristu amejifufua,
tazama Bwana kashinda mauti.
Bwana Yesu kafufuka,
Ameyashinda mauti watu
wote duniani tuimbe (aleluya),
Tuimbe (kafufuka),
aleluya aleluya Bwana
kafufuka tuimbe aleluya.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Maria Salome na Magdalena,
walishangazwa kulikuta
kaburi wazi.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Na malaika akawatokea,
akawaambia,
Bwana Yesu amefufuka.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Katangulia kule Galilaya,
nendeni huko ndiko
mtakakomkuta.
